After completing this chapter, you will be able to:

  • Describe the benefits of teleworking solutions.
  • Describe the requirements for supporting a teleworking solution using broadband.
  • Describe a cable system and cable broadband access.
  • Describe a DSL system and DSL broadband access.
  • Describe broadband wireless options.
  • Select an appropriate broadband solution for a given network requirement.
  • Describe the operation of Point-to-Point Protocol over Ethernet (PPPoE).
  • Configure a basic PPP over Ethernet connection on a client router.
